project.name: Murmur
project.description: Murmur re-imagines mailing lists and community discourse for the age of social media. Murmur introduces new features to the mailing list so that you can communicate with your group in the way that you desire and filter the conversation that you want to read.

project.name: Wikum
project.description: Wikum is a tool for summarizing and exploring long comment threads. Its recursive summarization workflow enables a group of people to work in small doses to refine out the main points of the discussion. The result is a summary tree that enables a reader to explore distinct subtopics at multiple levels of detail.

project.name: Mavo
project.description: Mavo is a library that lets anyone turn a static HTML document into a fully functioning reactive web application with data presentation, editing, and storage and lightweight computation, all without writing a single line of Javascript.
